A true Protestant bridle, or, Some cursory remarks upon a sermon preached before the Lord Mayor, at St. Mary-Le-Bow, Jan. 30th, 1693/4 in a letter to Sir P.D. Bar. T. R. (Thomas Rogers), 1660-1694.
24 p.
Printed and are to be sold by most of the booksellers of London and Westminster, London : 1694.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
